title: Configure content pack import size
content:
The default size limit of content packs that you can upload to OO Workflow Designer is 200 MB (the exact size limit is 209715200 bytes).

However, you can configure this size limit. For example, you may want to adjust the size limit to protect from DoS (Denial of Service) attacks.

To configure the content pack import size:

  1. Open the secured.properties file, located under <installation_dir>/designer/var/security/.
  2. Update the value for the upload.max.fileSize.limit property. 
    upload.max.fileSize.limit=209715200
  3. Restart OO Workflow Designer.
